channel.title: Breaking bad habits, need help, no joke
channel.description: how do you break bad habits, like searching bad stuff on the internet, dont be stupid, i feel quite bad about it

item.title: Breaking bad habits, need help, no joke
item.dc:creator: @nicko9000 nicko9000
item.description:
@nicko9000 wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:12, topic:98325”][quote author=Duhsmersh link=topic=141380.msg1357696#msg1357696 date=1179816825]

Looking at Pornography is a sin in Christianity, it’s a major sin.

Crap, it is?
[/quote]

Actualy if you knew anything,All sins are considered eaqule(sp?). Lying is just as bad as killing in God’s eyes. Just saying…[/quote]

not bad if you dont beleive in god :P::P[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 11:59:22 AM[/size][hr]wh[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:76, topic:98325”][quote author=i am lolscape link=topic=141380.msg1367452#msg1367452 date=1179996716]
Ok no offence Yz85Racer but you should not read this stuff at your age.
[/quote]
Dawn,

  1. I fall short to see how i am lolscape’s comment would make anyone laugh. Seeing how there’s not one bit of comedy about it.
  2. If I am correct, you’re breaking rules by just writing “LOL”. So consider yourself reported.
  3. I think you only laughed at the comment because you hate me… Fair enough, but there’s better ways to show it.

i am lolscape.
No, I probably shouldn’t be. But all 13 year olds do these days. If you’re 13 and haven’t looked up porn once in your life, you probably are a bit of center.[/quote]who hasnt looked at porn once in there life

been doing it since like 7 years old

cant break my addiction, but you guys have it lucky, i have to resort to psp internet so my dad cant track my history :D[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 12:03:06 PM[/size][hr][quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:32, topic:98325”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=141380.msg1357865#msg1357865 date=1179819142]

Looking at Pornography is a sin in Christianity, it’s a major sin.

Crap, it is?

Actualy if you knew anything,All sins are considered eaqule(sp?). Lying is just as bad as killing in God’s eyes. Just saying…
[/quote]

If you knew anything, you’d know how to spell “equal”. I only said it was a major sin because it’s Adultry, which is on the Ten Commandments, most of the other Commandments are listed throughout the bible.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 10:13:06 PM[/size][hr][quote author=gho5t link=topic=141380.msg1367487#msg1367487 date=1179997380]
Omfg is it really necessary to start a big religious debate?
I mean honestly, this topic is about some guy trying to break a bad habit, and we’re spamming it up by pushing our own religions onto him.
Just to let you know id set up parental controls on my own comp so then i couldnt even search for porn and stuff just a suggestion
[/quote]

The topic starter himself chose to change it to this, he started evangelising to Goatee, but apparently Goatee doesn’t want to be preached to, and, I don’t blame him, forcing something on people is wrong, I mean, if you don’t want to talk about Christianity, don’t speak in this topic, and quit using it as an excuse to flame.[/quote]

this bit is the man who mentioned other religions beleiving in something higher: buddhists dont beleive in somehting higher, they dont HAVE to believe (SP?) in god, we beleive in reincarnation, not nesseceraly going to heaven and hell

th4t0n36uy

would you rather follow “rules” or figure out for yourself what is right and what is wrong

if you think telling a lie is ok then its ok

your choice

NOTE: sorry for all the posts ive only just started reading this topic

Read full topic

Dawn,

  1. I fall short to see how i am lolscape’s comment would make anyone laugh. Seeing how there’s not one bit of comedy about it.
  2. If I am correct, you’re breaking rules by just writing “LOL”. So consider yourself reported.
  3. I think you only laughed at the comment because you hate me… Fair enough, but there’s better ways to show it.

i am lolscape.
No, I probably shouldn’t be. But all 13 year olds do these days. If you’re 13 and haven’t looked up porn once in your life, you probably are a bit of center.

By the way. Dawn deleted his post. What a noob. Luckily I quoted it.

[quote=“Dawn, post:75, topic:98325”][quote author=i am lolscape link=topic=141380.msg1367452#msg1367452 date=1179996716]
Ok no offence Yz85Racer but you should not read this stuff at your age.
[/quote]
LOL[/quote]

item.title: Breaking bad habits, need help, no joke
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Damn you no hope! You made me go there.

[quote=“Rictoo, post:64, topic:98325”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=141380.msg1403613#msg1403613 date=1180597675]
Christians are just jealous because they don’t have a big penis to masturbate so they make a rule against it, sounds like religion to me, always trying to be controlling.

Edit: Why do you assume he’s talking about porn.
[/quote]

The place where it writes that masturbation is a sin is in the Old Testament. afaik as long as you’re not a Jew…[/quote]

Rictoo, masturbating isn’t a sin, but committing adultery is, and by looking at pornography you are sinning. Oh, and for your earlier post, something about… Catholic Dogma, it is true that all sins are equal, and that no matter what you do, you can be forgiven, but that may not mean you will always go to heaven.

Enough of my preaching, this was about Blah bah7 masturbating too much and needing to stop, and I’m sure by now he’s either stopped looking at dirty things on the internet or he’s masturbating to the Bible, so, at this point I don’t care.

Read full topic

item.title: Breaking bad habits, need help, no joke
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:71, topic:98325”][quote author=goatee link=topic=141380.msg1359810#msg1359810 date=1179880606]

UltimaCool, that is only blocking the sites, not getting rid of his addiction, that isn’t the right way to go, he needs to stop it at the source, and the best way to do that, is to practice religion, like KoRnRoOsTeR said. Looking at Pornography is a sin in Christianity, it’s a major sin. Another way to stop the addiction is to use your imagination, but even then, that’s lust, which is a sin. But, I mean, it’s getting closer to stopping the bad habbit.

ur right, ill just think of god when I’m on the internet (if anyone doesn’t know, i AM a Christian)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 01:26:31 PM[/size][hr]religion is good, would you rather get in arguments sometimes or burn in hell

I’ll burn in hell rather than spend my life worshipping an unrealistic figure.
[/quote]
IDK if ne1 has brought it up yet, but even all the big scientists are admitting they believe in god, some one had a really good point, how did the universe come to be…it had to start some were, and how did it start then…[/quote]

Lol ALL the big scientists? Less people are religious now than in the past.

Anyways… to be honest i really don’t think I need the answer to who made everything. If i found out what would it matter? I just know something else, it wouldn’t help me in anyway.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:68, topic:98325”][quote author=Stroud link=topic=141380.msg1403432#msg1403432 date=1180595265]
Well, every time you have the urge, just think of what you’ve got to look forward to tomorrow. That works alot for me. Like tomorrow me and my friends are going to california, for my birthday. So, instead of masturbating, i just remember that im gonna be happy tomorrow, and why ruin it by sinning? Well that’s what i do
[/quote]

Are you gay? lel[/quote]ROFL OMFG ROFL

item.dc:creator: @Painless Painless
item.description:
@Painless wrote:

[quote=“MybJames, post:43, topic:98325”][quote author=Painless link=topic=141380.msg1371339#msg1371339 date=1180096138]

Looking at Pornography is a sin in Christianity, it’s a major sin.

Crap, it is?

Actualy if you knew anything,All sins are considered eaqule(sp?). Lying is just as bad as killing in God’s eyes. Just saying…

But he forgives you for anything, so why think about sinning when you’ll be cleared of it anyway?

common misconception, people make god out like a loving figure.

I’m not religious, but I go to an Anglican School. The Priest says God will forgive you for anything you do, if you ask him to… Or something along those lines.
[/quote]

That would be known as a liar. The bible told us that Adam and Eve sinned against God. They were abolished from the garden of eden to live unhappily and struggle out in the real world.[/quote]

This was a reading from the bible

I love how the bible contradicts itself.
